title: Smart Insight
description: Smart Insight is Saas Based Application whose work is to Help People Analyse data with Their CRM and analysis Dashboards
clientBrief: Smart Insight is a SaaS-based web application designed to help businesses analyze their CRM data through interactive dashboards and powerful visual insights. The platform focuses on simplifying complex data into actionable metrics, enabling users to make smarter, data-driven decisions for improved performance, growth, and customer engagement.
caseStudy: Smart Insight is a SaaS-based UI/UX design project in which i aimed at helping businesses analyze and visualize their CRM data through an intuitive and modern web interface. The focus was on creating a seamless user experience with clean layouts, clear data representation, and interactive dashboards. The design emphasizes accessibility, responsiveness, and simplicity, ensuring users can easily interpret complex data insights. By combining structured navigation, vibrant data visuals, and consistent branding, Smart Insight delivers a professional yet user-friendly experience that enhances engagement and decision-making efficiency. The project reflects a balance of functionality, aesthetics, and user-centric design tailored for data-driven businesses.
